description: This file is a PHP-based web page implementing step 1 of a home network wizard. It includes HTML markup, JavaScript code for form validation and interaction, and server-side PHP includes for header, footer, and other components. The page is used to change the device's admin password through a web interface.

methods.name: getInstanceNum
methods.description: Determines the instance number based on the logged-in user.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends the new password configuration to the server via AJAX and handles the response.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: Validates that the new password is different from the current password and initiates the configuration update.
